cars.description: The 2023 Audi S8 stands as the pinnacle of Audi's luxury sedan lineup, combining opulent comfort with breathtaking performance. Powered by a formidable 4.0L V8 engine generating 563 horsepower, this executive sedan delivers effortless acceleration while maintaining a sophisticated presence. Available in brown, blue, or black, the S8 features Audi's renowned Quattro all-wheel-drive system and an 8-speed automatic transmission. With a delivery time of just 4 weeks and free delivery, this $119,500 luxury sedan comes with a generous 5% reduction. Despite its substantial 2,230 kg weight, the S8 achieves a respectable 17.5 MPG and a top speed of 250 km/h.

The 2023 Audi RS7 is a high-performance sportback that seamlessly blends aggressive styling with practical versatility. With its thunderous 4.0L V8 engine producing 591 horsepower, the RS7 accelerates with savage intensity while its five-door configuration offers unexpected practicality. Available in red, grey, or black, this AWD performance car features an 8-speed automatic transmission and boasts an impressive top speed of 305 km/h. Priced at $125,900 with a 3-week delivery time, the RS7 weighs 2,065 kg and returns 16.8 MPG. Its sleek, fastback silhouette disguises its practical nature while announcing its performance credentials through aggressive styling cues.

The 2023 Audi RS6 is the ultimate performance wagon, combining supercar acceleration with family-friendly utility. Powered by a robust 4.0L V8 engine delivering 591 horsepower, this all-wheel-drive estate offers blistering performance with a practical edge. Available in grey, blue, or black, the RS6 features an 8-speed automatic transmission and achieves a remarkable top speed of 305 km/h despite its 2,150 kg weight. Priced at $121,400 with a 3% reduction, this versatile performer features five doors and returns 16.1 MPG. With a delivery time of 5 weeks, the RS6 represents the perfect balance between high-performance thrills and everyday usability, redefining expectations for what a family wagon can be.

The 2024 Audi RS5 Coupe is a precision-engineered sports car that delivers exhilarating performance in a sleek two-door package. Currently unavailable but highly anticipated, this compact powerhouse is driven by a responsive 2.9L V6 engine producing 444 horsepower. Available in red, grey, or white, the RS5 Coupe features Audi's Quattro all-wheel-drive system and an 8-speed automatic transmission, enabling a thrilling top speed of 280 km/h. With a relatively light 1,742 kg weight, this $87,500 performance coupe achieves a respectable 19.6 MPG. The RS5 Coupe combines aggressive styling with German engineering excellence, creating a driving experience that's both refined and exhilarating.

The 2023 Audi RS3 is a compact performance sedan that punches well above its weight class. Powered by a unique 2.5L inline-5 engine producing 401 horsepower, this nimble performer delivers distinctive engine sound and character. Available in eye-catching yellow, white, or green, the RS3 features a responsive 7-speed dual-clutch transmission and all-wheel drive, propelling it to a top speed of 290 km/h. Weighing just 1,575 kg, this $65,800 compact sports sedan (reduced by 4%) achieves an impressive 23.2 MPG while delivering exhilarating performance. With a delivery time of just 3 weeks, the RS3 represents the perfect entry point into Audi's high-performance RS lineup.

The 2023 Mercedes S63 represents the absolute pinnacle of luxury performance sedans. This flagship model combines sumptuous comfort with breathtaking acceleration, courtesy of its sophisticated 4.0L V8 Hybrid powertrain producing an astonishing 791 horsepower. Available in green, white, or black, this technological tour de force features Mercedes' advanced 9-speed automatic transmission and all-wheel drive. Despite its substantial 2,420 kg weight, the S63 achieves an impressive 22.8 MPG and a top speed of 290 km/h. Priced at $185,400 with free delivery (albeit with a 6-week wait time), this four-door masterpiece of German engineering delivers an unmatched combination of opulence and performance.

The 2023 Mercedes G63 is a luxury SUV that combines rugged off-road capability with high-performance luxury. Powered by a 4.0L V8 BiTurbo engine producing 577 horsepower, this iconic SUV delivers both power and prestige. Available in green, red, or white, the G63 features a robust all-wheel-drive system and a 9-speed automatic transmission. With a weight of 2,650 kg, it achieves a respectable 14.3 MPG and a top speed of 220 km/h. Priced at $179,950 with a delivery time of just 5 weeks and a delivery fee of $2,000, this five-door SUV is perfect for those who demand both luxury and adventure.

The 2024 Mercedes GT63 Coupe is a stunning blend of performance and luxury, designed for those who demand the best. Powered by a 4.0L V8 BiTurbo engine producing 630 horsepower, this two-door coupe delivers exhilarating acceleration and handling. Available in black, grey, or orange, the GT63 features a sophisticated all-wheel-drive system and a 9-speed automatic transmission. Weighing in at 2,045 kg, it achieves a top speed of 315 km/h and a respectable 16.5 MPG. Priced at $175,000 with a delivery time of just 4 weeks and a delivery fee of $1,500, this coupe is perfect for those who appreciate both style and performance.

The 2023 Mercedes GT63 is a high-performance luxury sedan that combines stunning design with blistering performance. Powered by a 4.0L V8 Hybrid engine producing an astonishing 843 horsepower, this four-door coupe accelerates with breathtaking speed. Available in grey, yellow, or black, the GT63 features a sophisticated all-wheel-drive system and a 9-speed automatic transmission. Weighing in at 2,380 kg, it achieves a top speed of 316 km/h and a respectable 21.2 MPG. Priced at $190,000 with free delivery (but a longer wait time of 7 weeks), this luxury sedan is perfect for those who demand the ultimate in performance and style.

The 2023 Mercedes C63 is a compact luxury sedan that delivers thrilling performance in a stylish package. Powered by a 2.0L I4 Hybrid engine producing 671 horsepower, this four-door sedan accelerates with impressive speed. Available in black or blue, the C63 features an advanced all-wheel-drive system and a 9-speed automatic transmission. Weighing in at 1,850 kg, it achieves a top speed of 280 km/h and a respectable 27.4 MPG. Priced at $84,900 with a delivery time of just 3 weeks and a delivery fee of $1,000, this luxury sedan is perfect for those who appreciate both style and performance.

The 2023 BMW M2 is a compact sports coupe that embodies the brand's performance DNA. Powered by a 3.0L I6 engine producing 453 horsepower, this two-door coupe delivers exhilarating acceleration and handling. Available in blue, green, or white, the M2 features a rear-wheel-drive layout and an 8-speed automatic transmission. Weighing in at 1,700 kg, it achieves a top speed of 280 km/h and a respectable 19.8 MPG. Priced at $63,700 with a delivery time of just 2 weeks and a delivery fee of $1,000, this luxury coupe is perfect for those who appreciate both style and performance.

The 2023 BMW M3 is a high-performance sports sedan that combines luxury with exhilarating performance. Powered by a 3.0L I6 engine producing 473 horsepower, this four-door sedan delivers thrilling acceleration and handling. Available in black, green, or red, the M3 features a rear-wheel-drive layout and an 8-speed automatic transmission. Weighing in at 1,780 kg, it achieves a top speed of 290 km/h and a respectable 19.3 MPG. Priced at $76,500 with a delivery time of just 4 weeks and a delivery fee of $1,500, this luxury sedan is perfect for those who appreciate both style and performance.

The 2023 BMW M8 Alpina is a luxury performance coupe that combines stunning design with blistering performance. Powered by a 4.4L V8 engine producing 612 horsepower, this two-door coupe accelerates with breathtaking speed. Available in blue, green, or white, the M8 Alpina features an all-wheel-drive system and an 8-speed automatic transmission. Weighing in at 1,900 kg, it achieves a top speed of 305 km/h and a respectable 17.2 MPG. Priced at $143,500 with a delivery time of just 6 weeks and free delivery, this luxury coupe is perfect for those who demand the ultimate in performance and style.

The 2023 BMW M4 is a high-performance coupe that combines stunning design with exhilarating performance. Powered by a 3.0L I6 engine producing 503 horsepower, this two-door coupe delivers thrilling acceleration and handling. Available in black, green, or blue, the M4 features an all-wheel-drive system and an 8-speed automatic transmission. Weighing in at 1,750 kg, it achieves a top speed of 290 km/h and a respectable 19.5 MPG. Priced at $79,900 with a delivery time of just 3 weeks and a delivery fee of $1,200, this luxury coupe is perfect for those who appreciate both style and performance.

The 2023 BMW M5 is a high-performance luxury sedan that combines stunning design with blistering performance. Powered by a 4.4L V8 engine producing 600 horsepower, this four-door sedan accelerates with breathtaking speed. Available in green, red, or black, the M5 features an all-wheel-drive system and an 8-speed automatic transmission. Weighing in at 1,930 kg, it achieves a top speed of 305 km/h and a respectable 17.7 MPG. Priced at $110,000 with a delivery time of just 5 weeks and free delivery, this luxury sedan is perfect for those who demand the ultimate in performance and style.

The 2023 BMW M7 is a luxury performance sedan that combines stunning design with blistering performance. Powered by a 4.4L V8 engine producing 600 horsepower, this four-door sedan accelerates with breathtaking speed. Available in black, blue, or white, the M7 features an all-wheel-drive system and an 8-speed automatic transmission. Weighing in at 2,200 kg, it achieves a top speed of 305 km/h and a respectable 17.5 MPG. Priced at $130,000 with a delivery time of just 5 weeks and free delivery, this luxury sedan is perfect for those who demand the ultimate in performance and style.
